result.arabic_text: قُلۡ أَنفِقُواْ طَوۡعًا أَوۡ كَرۡهٗا لَّن يُتَقَبَّلَ مِنكُمۡ إِنَّكُمۡ كُنتُمۡ قَوۡمٗا فَٰسِقِينَ
result.translation: 53.Nabiyow munaafiqhiinik sinni maalu elle faxxa haytan innal acuya faxak hinnay faxewaak inkinnah Yalli sin mattaccoo siinik moggolak, diggah isin Yallih taaqatak yewqe mara tekkeenimih sabbatah keenik ixxic.
